name: OS C Lab (Ubuntu 20.04)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -eux; apt-get update; apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends build-essential gcc-9 g++-9 make gdb ca-certificates; update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-9 90; update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-9 90; gcc --version'
